title: Design and Implementation of an LLM-Based Automated Programming Grading System

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening formative assessment design capabilities for current science teachers using automated programming grading systems

learning_goals: Learners can design an LLM-based test case generation process by analyzing problem descriptions and sample code.
Learners can verify and supplement the suitability of generated test cases.
Learners can apply an automated grading system to real educational settings and analyze results based on data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
